p: Air quality simulations were performed using the CMAQ model version 5.0.1 [ 67, 80]. Anthropogenic emissions were input from the EPA 2011 NEI [ 81], and biogenic emissions were simulated using MEGAN version 2.1 [ 82]. We focus on July 2011 conditions for the present-day as representative of peak summertime electricity demand and production within the high O 3 season, consistent with past literature and the latest available NEI emissions data at the time of modeling [ 31]. S1 Text includes validation of results and discussion of model performance.
